titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 5376) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S. Con. Res. 14.
Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 5376) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S. Con. Res. 14.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-175, by Mr. McGovern.
Providing for further consideration of H.R. 5376, that the further amendment printed in the report shall be considered as adopted.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 46.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 803.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 210 (Roll no. 382).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 220 - 211 (Roll no. 383).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution provides for further consideration of H.R. 5376 (commonly referred to as the Build Back Better Act) and requires that the accompanying technical amendment be considered adopted.
